```{r child_gene_sets1, context="server"}
output$gene_sets1 <- renderDataTable({
	go <- igo()
	syms <- isolate(isym1())

	if(syms=="")return(NULL)
	eids <- df$eid[grep(paste0("^",syms),df$sym,ignore.case=T)]

	dt <- df %>% filter(eid %in% eids) %>%
		select(eid, sym, efficacy, selectivity) %>%
		`colnames<-`(c("gene.id","symbol","eff","sel")) %>%
		arrange(eff,desc(sel)) %>%
		datatable()
		# datatable(extensions = 'Scroller', 
		# 	options = list(
		# 		rowReorder = TRUE
		# 	  deferRender = TRUE,
		# 	  scrollY = 200,
		# 	  scroller = TRUE
		# 	))
	return(dt)
})
```
